product_info.body_html:
Requirements

Broadband internet connection (1 Mbps upload recommended)
Wi-Fi or Ethernet
Available power outlet
iOS 8 or newer
Android 4.1 or newer

Tech Spec

Size: 5.91x4.72x8.86 inches (15x12x22.5cm)
Weight: 1.76 lbs. (800g)
Camera: 720P HD, 120° wide-angle lens, 4x digital zoom, Automatic night vision
Audio: Built-in speaker, High quality microphone 
Treat capacity: 30 pc
Recommended treat: Round shaped treats with a diameter around 0.4" (1 cm)  
Power: 100-240V, 5V2A 
Connectivity: 2.4GHz Wi-Fi (802.11 b/g/n), Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)

Inside the box

Furbo Dog Camera
USB cable
Furbo power adaptor
Quick start guide

Warranty

1-year limited warranty (Warranty policy)

feature_content.text: Auto barking detection and push notification.
Customize detection sensitivity according to your dog.
Track all your dog's special moment.
Share the love with family and friends.
Round-shaped treats with a diameter of 0.4 in/1cm work best.
Exclusive to Furbo Dog Nanny subscribers.
Dog Activity Alert, Person Alert, Home Emergency Alert, and many more.
Exclusive to Furbo Dog Nanny subscribers.
1-minute time-lapse video clip of your dog's day.
Exclusive to Furbo Dog Nanny subscribers.

subtitle.text: See in super clear 1080p Full HD, 4x zoom, 160° wide-angle and night vision. It's the best of the best pet cam out there.
Make a one-time purchase of your own Furbo Dog Camera with an optional subscription to Furbo Dog Nanny’s features for $6.99 a month!

background_image_desktop.alt: Make a one-time purchase of your own Furbo Dog Camera with an optional subscription to Furbo Dog Nanny’s features for $6.99 a month!

background_image_mobile.alt: Make a one-time purchase of your own Furbo Dog Camera with an optional subscription to Furbo Dog Nanny’s features for $6.99 a month!

text_content.text: All your 15-second video clips are saved within Cloud Recordings, so you can play back all the activity you missed during the day. Never miss out on a precious moment!
Know exactly what’s going on at home and be alerted of emergencies in real time.

subtitle.text: See the Highlights of the Day

text_content.text: Furbo captures your pup’s adorable moments and creates a daily highlight video, allowing you to share the best memories with your friends and family.

accordion_text_content.text: Furbo provides additional ways to keep your dog safe and happy via voice control. Alleviate your dog's separation anxiety by scheduling treat tossing using Alexa.

item_content.text: For optimal performance, we recommend using the most up-to-date version of any operating system and app.
Apple iOS 12 or newer (must support Bluetooth 4.0)
Android 8.0 or newer (must support Bluetooth 4.0) with Google Play, Google Services

Size: 5.91x4.72x8.86 inches (15x12x22.5cm)
Weight: 2.1 pounds (950g)
Camera: 1080p HD, 160° wide-angle lens, 4x digital zoom, automatic night vision
Audio: Built-in speaker, high-quality microphone
Treat capacity: 100 pieces
Recommended treat: Round shaped treats with a diameter around 0.4 inches(1cm)
Power: 100-240V, 5V2A
Connectivity: 2.4GHz Wi-Fi (802.11 b/g/n), Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE)

Furbo Dog Camera
2M USB cable
Furbo power adapter
Quick start guide

content_title.text: How can Furbo keep my dog safe?

content_text.text: Furbo has saved over 2800 dogs! Furbo will send you alerts of any important events happening at home, so you can be alerted of any emergencies in real time.

content_title.text: How is Furbo different from generic security cameras?

content_text.text: Every element of Furbo is designed for dogs. Furbo is recommended by vets and dog trainers and can help alleviate your dog’s separation anxiety. Furbo's life-saving Smart Alerts can detect dog-related events and alert you about what’s happening at home.

content_title.text: Do I have to pay for Furbo Dog Nanny?

content_text.text: No, Furbo Dog Nanny is an OPTIONAL subscription service that you can choose to purchase after your 30-day FREE trial, included with your purchase, is over.
We recommend using dry, firm and round treats that are 0.5in for best treat-toss results!

content_title.text: Is Furbo suitable for large dogs?

content_text.text: During the development process of Furbo, many dogs of different sizes, breeds, and personalities tested out the sturdiness of Furbo. That’s why you will find a fixed 3M doubled-sided tape on the bottom of your Furbo, to prevent it from being knocked over. We recommend placing Furbo 12-20 inches above the floor (or based on the height of your dog and its mobility).
If you are not fully satisfied with your Furbo, you will have 30 days to return or exchange your Furbo.

content_title.text: Does Furbo come with a warranty?

content_text.text: Yes! Furbo comes with a one year warranty starting from the date of shipping.

card_content.text: Great for keeping track of your pup while at work

After purchasing this as a gift previously, I finally got around to purchasing this for myself, and boy was that a good decision! 
...read more

card_expand_content.text: Great for keeping track of your pup while at work

After purchasing this as a gift previously, I finally got around to purchasing this for myself, and boy was that a good decision! My dog loves it, and it's extremely comforting knowing that my dog is safe at home while I'm away at work!

card_content.text:
I have 7 dogs and most are seniors, so I need to know what is going on throughout the day in case someone is sick. Furbo is PAWSOME!
...read more

card_expand_content.text: I have 7 dogs and most are seniors, so I need to know what is going on throughout the day in case someone is sick. Furbo is PAWSOME! I love the clarity and I know what is going on with the notifications to my phone. I can see them anytime I want and see that they are OK! Peace of mind is everything!

card_content.text:
This is by far the best interactive pet camera ever. While my pup is home alone I can check on her, give her a treat or just make sure she's safe.
...read more

card_expand_content.text: This is by far the best interactive pet camera ever. While my pup is home alone I can check on her, give her a treat or just make sure she's safe. She loves when the light changes color, running from wherever she is lounging to wait for a treat and I can make great videos of her at the same time. I would recommend this for any pet owner. It's fantastic!

card_content.text:
I was always concerned about leaving my puppy home alone because he will cry a lot. When I got Furbo, things got much better!
...read more

card_expand_content.text: I was always concerned about leaving my puppy home alone because he will cry a lot. When I got Furbo, things got much better! Furbo sent me notifications to my phone when he was crying, so I would log on and talk to him right away. This changed everything!! My puppy knows I'm always there, so his separation anxiety is getting better. I feel much more relieved!

card_content.text:
I don't typically write reviews but last week Furbo actually saved my dog's life! My puppy was home alone and I got a Dog Activity Alert from Furbo.
...read more

card_expand_content.text: I don't typically write reviews but last week Furbo actually saved my dog's life! My puppy was home alone and I got a Dog Activity Alert from Furbo. When I looked at the camera, I saw that she had pulled a bag of treats from the counter and it was over her head and she was stuck. I was able to keep her engaged with me by throwing treats using Furbo while I rushed home to help. Without Furbo my puppy would have suffocated in that bag. So thankful for this camera!

card_content.text:
I bought Furbo thinking it would just be something fun to see what my dog does while I'm away. Little did I know it would help in a dog medical emergency!
...read more

card_expand_content.text: I bought Furbo thinking it would just be something fun to see what my dog does while I'm away. Little did I know it would help in a dog medical emergency! While I was away, my dog somehow got into her medication and ate a whole week's worth of pills. When I got home there was vomit everywhere. I was able to check Furbo's recordings to see what time she had eaten all the pills, this information helped greatly when I called animal poison control and go to the emergency vet! So thankful for Furbo!
